text_elements.text:
LLM Evolution:
From RNN/LSTM limitations to Transformer revolution with self-attention mechanisms

Modern IR:
Shift from term-based to neural retrieval with integrated IR stack

Dataset Benchmark:
From static test sets to dynamic, diverse, and capability-driven evaluation of LLM performance

Figure 1: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
Neural retrieval architecture integrating external knowledge bases for information-intensive queries

Figure 2: SmoothQuant
Mixed-precision quantization technique that migrates difficulty between activations and weights for efficient model compression

Figure 3: Self-Routing Architecture
Adaptive routing mechanisms for dynamic model selection and optimization
Adaptive Query-Routing Framework for Optimizing Small Language Models

Quantization:
From full-precision models to efficient low-bit inference for scalable deployment
